message: Can anyone point me to an advance example on how to generate PowerPoint via Python?  I have seen it from Wesley Chun's Google I/O presentation.  And I need something that generate more than a few bullet points.
This might help not PP but slide generator https://github.com/imakewebthings/deck.js
Here is a Python powered project that does what Wes's stuff does but He siad this might be better,, not PP though https://github.com/adamzap/landslide
Not exactly PP, but instead for Libre Office, but you can do slides in ReStructured Text and then convert to Impress using rst2odp - http://pypi.python.org/pypi/rst2odp.
Not exactly PP, but instead for Libre Office, but you can do slides in ReStructured Text and then convert to Impress using rst2odp - http://pypi.python.org/pypi/rst2odp.
